description: This file is a React component representing a product detail page in an e-commerce frontend. It fetches product data based on URL params, displays product information including images, price, discount, and supports adding items to the cart both locally and remotely.

methods.name: addLocal
methods.description: Adds the current product to the local cart store.

methods.name: addRemote
methods.description: Attempts to add the current product to the remote cart via API, ignores errors (like not authenticated).

methods.name: addToCart
methods.description: Handles adding the product to both local and remote carts.
